summary: Website project for “awarenessoveraddictionofficial” focused on helping people by providing informational content (addiction and recovery resources).
architectural_notes: Contact page should provide a non-real-time contact method limited to email + Instagram for India Support Contact; do not display a phone number.

existing_features.title: Create a public, informational website for “awarenessoveraddictionofficial” that helps visitors understand addiction and recovery through clearly structured educational content.

Add core informational sections with English user-facing text: (1) What Addiction Is, (2) Signs & Risk Factors, (3) Recovery Basics, (4) How to Support Someone, (5) Relapse & What to Do Next, (6) Frequently Asked Questions.

Add a “Get Help Now” / “Resources” area that includes crisis-focused guidance (e.g., ‘If you are in immediate danger, call your local emergency number’) and a curated list of external helplines/resources with clickable links.

Add an “About” page describing the mission of Awareness Over Addiction Official and a simple “Contact” page that provides a non-real-time way to reach out (e.g., a contact form that clearly states it may not be monitored 24/7, or a displayed contact email if provided later).

Apply one cohesive, distinctive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components), avoiding blue/purple as the dominant palette, and ensure the design supports calm, supportive, accessible reading.

Add generated static brand assets (logo and a hero illustration) and render them on the site (e.g., logo in header/footer and hero image on the home page) from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).

Replace the existing Contact page content (including the contact form) with a single section titled "India Support Contact" that displays only the provided email address and Instagram handle, and does not display any phone number.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an informational website for awarenessoveraddictionofficial to help people with addiction/recovery information and resources.

Replace the Contact page content with an “India Support Contact” section showing only email (awarenessoveraddictionoffial@gmail.com) and Instagram handle (awarenessoveraddictionofficial), with no phone number.
